query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS dish_votes (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  dish_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  liked INT NOT NULL,
  context VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'meal_plan',
  metadata TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_dish_votes_user_id (user_id),
  INDEX idx_dish_votes_dish_name (dish_name),
  INDEX idx_dish_votes_user_dish (user_id, dish_name),
  INDEX idx_dish_votes_context (context)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3HwhU55c9ykAFSx.root --database PWe3aXVRBZJqm34KdWoMVL --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS dish_votes (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  dish_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  liked INT NOT NULL,
  context VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'meal_plan',
  metadata TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_dish_votes_user_id (user_id),
  INDEX idx_dish_votes_dish_name (dish_name),
  INDEX idx_dish_votes_user_dish (user_id, dish_name),
  INDEX idx_dish_votes_context (context)
);
